item.title: Carbon for code screenshots
item.description: Create and share beautiful images of your source code. Start typing or drop a file into the text area to get started. Carbon is a web-based code snippet generator, which you can use to create screenshots of your source code. Carbon supports syntax highlighting for over 60 languages and is highly customizable. Compared to creating a screenshot of the code editor or copying the code and pasting it into a Word OpenDocument object, this is much easier and aesthetically more pleasant (atleast in my opinion).

item.title: First post
item.description: At this point in time I have no idea what to write about. I’ll see what comes out of it. The wise man seeks little joys, knowing that life is long and that his quota of great joys is distinctly limited. - William Feather
